name: ShipO
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Out of Control

You are wandering in the vast and dangerous space in your heavily equipped ship. So many tools at your disposals: atomic blaster, magnetic sheild, anti-matter jet,... Unfortunately,  some crittical errors appear in the system, and now you only can control one function of the ship at any given moment. 

Try your best to stay alive!!!
